item.text: With regard to food sacrificed to idols, we know that “we all have knowledge.” Knowledge puffs up, but love builds up.

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="1380" class="">thinks</st> he <st data-num="1097" class="">knows</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">something</st>, he does <st data-num="3768">not yet</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="2531">to the degree that</st> he <st data-num="1163" class="">needs</st> to <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st>.
But if someone loves God, he is known by God.
With regard then to eating food sacrificed to idols, we know that “an idol in this world is nothing,” and that “there is no God but one.”

<st data-num="1512">If after all</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">so-called</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">gods</st>, <st data-num="1535" class="">whether</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="1535" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> (<st data-num="5618">as</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">gods</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="2962">lords</st>),
yet for us there is one God, the Father, from whom are all things and for whom we live, and one Lord, Jesus Christ, through whom are all things and through whom we live.
But this knowledge is not shared by all. And some, by being accustomed to idols in former times, eat this food as an idol sacrifice, and their conscience, because it is weak, is defiled.

<st data-num="1161">Now</st> <st data-num="1033" class="">food</st> will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3936" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="3936" class="">close</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>. We are <st data-num="3777" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5302" class="">worse</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> we do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2068">eat</st> and <st data-num="3777" class="">no</st> <st data-num="4052" class="">better</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> we <st data-num="2068">do</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> be <st data-num="991" class="">careful</st> that <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">liberty</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">yours</st> does <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">become</st> a <st data-num="4348" class="">hindrance</st> to the <st data-num="772" class="">weak</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="772" class="">weak</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">sees</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> who <st data-num="2192" class="">possess</st> <st data-num="1108" class="">knowledge</st> <st data-num="2621" class="">dining</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st><st data-num="1493"> an idol’s temple</st>, will <st data-num="3756">not</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4893" class="">conscience</st> be “<st data-num="3618">strengthened</st>”<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519">to</st> <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="1494">food offered to idols</st>?

<st data-num="1063" class="">So</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4674" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1108" class="">knowledge</st> the <st data-num="770" class="">weak</st> <st data-num="80">brother or sister</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="599" class="">died</st>, is <st data-num="622" class="">destroyed</st>.<n id="2" />

If you <st data-num="264" class="">sin</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">against</st> your <st data-num="80">brothers or sisters</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3779">in this way</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5180" class="">wound</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="770" class="">weak</st> <st data-num="4893" class="">conscience</st>, you <st data-num="264" class="">sin</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">against</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.
For this reason, if food causes my brother or sister to sin, I will never eat meat again, so that I may not cause one of them to sin.
